column4: hey everybody, i have a question about dell laptop partitions

alright, I have a dell laptop with 3 partitions, the main one with xp on it, a dell restore partition, and a dell utility partition. Since i can only hvae 4 partitions max and also want to dual boot with ubuntu, is it safe to delete the dell restore and dell utility partitions
if you have a problem with your windows partition the restore and utility partitions are what you would use
if you call Dell and tell them you want to change your partitions around they might send you the recovery and utility discs
